definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: The alternative, though cleaner, is leadership by wimps.
sentences.chinese: 而另一种选择，虽然干净，但却是被无能者领导。

sentences.english: And god help the user who clicks on an intersection.
sentences.chinese: 还有，如果用户点击交叉口的话，系统也无能为力。

sentences.english: I'm not ashamed of my incompetence in these areas.
sentences.chinese: 我对这些领域的无能无力毫不羞愧。

sentences.english: Dyslexic children often think they are unable to learn.
sentences.chinese: 有语言障碍的孩子常认为他们对学习无能为力。

sentences.english: Discussions of marriage cannot avoid topics such as impotence and adultery.
sentences.chinese: 讨论婚姻不可能避开性无能和通奸这样的题目。

sentences.english: Violence is the last refuge of the incompetent.
sentences.chinese: 暴力是无能者的最后手段。

sentences.english: FEW sensations of helplessness match that of driving a car that unexpectedly skids .
sentences.chinese: 开车过程中由于意外打滑而感到无能为力是很罕见的。

sentences.english: The Lehmans episode demonstrates that incompetence has a price.
sentences.chinese: 雷曼这个小插曲说明了无能有价。
它对复制自己无能为力。

sentences.english: Women find it wussy, and it annoys the heck out of them.
sentences.chinese: 女人觉得这是懦弱无能的表现，对这点她们厌恶无比。

sentences.english: Without further evidence, Beal told her, there was nothing he could do.
sentences.chinese: Beal说没有进一步证据，他无能为力。

sentences.english: The general had exhausted all his means and could do nothing to hold back the enemy's attack.
sentences.chinese: 面对敌人的进攻，将军已计穷智短，无能为力。

sentences.english: For centuries, medicine was impotent and hence unproblematic.
sentences.chinese: 几个世纪以来，药品，是无能为力的，因此不成问题。

sentences.english: I hate it when guys play weak and let the woman be the tough one.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌男孩子装软弱装无能，而让女孩子唱红脸。

sentences.english: Police Incompetence and Corruptness a World Wide Epidemic.
sentences.chinese: 无能的警察，全球风靡的腐败现象。

sentences.english: It destabilises the club and the players and we can't do anything about it.
sentences.chinese: 这会使军心动摇，不过我们对此也无能为力。

definition: to believe oneself infallible (idiom)/to be opinionated
greedy for life, afraid of death (idiom); craven and cowardly/clinging abjectly to life/only interested in saving one's neck
not one good point/everything about it is wrong
